message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that has immense potential.  While I can't disclose specifics, I can assure you it's worth at least $800000 to me. I believe it could be even more valuable to the right buyer.  I'm willing to offer it to you for $950000.  This is a significant price point, reflecting the potential value of this product. Consider it a chance to acquire something truly unique and valuable.  Please let me know if you're interested.
